DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether MRI with manganese containing contrast agent detects more livermetastasis compared to CT scan
DOC.brief_title: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) Using Liverspecific Oral Contrast Agent in Metastatic Colorectal Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: biopsy proved liver metastasis pacemaker, metal in the body, claustrophobia, pregnancy, age below 18 years, psychiatry patients
